title: What are your thoughts about post-pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Its is going to be an era of change.Social distance Mask Sanitizer Hand wash & General Health & Fitness is going to be in focus.Things can change Post 2020 in early 2021 when a Vaccine is developed.The fact is that we cant stay indoors forever but we can Definitely change things & make them a part of healthy living
